commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.body: Previously these were using ruby for the UI and python for the implementation with bash to bind it together.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: Previously we excluded `text.html` from this setting but this is no longer necessary as it has it's own value now.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Disable indent corrections for specializations of text.html
commits.body: Previously we disabled it for “text” except “text.html”, which would mean it was also enabled e.g. for “text.html.markdown” (undesired). We now only make “text.html.basic” the exception.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Include “Randomize Lines” in the sort menu (bound to F5)

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.body:
For some non-ASCII characters we get an error from /usr/bin/sort stating that we have an “illegal byte sequence”. Since the system lack proper collation info for non-ASCII characters, forcing "C" as the character type/locale is only a loss for people who have installed a replacement sort command (or collation info).

Closes #12

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Make “Convert Hex to Character” work without a selection

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Soft-wrap secondary paragraphs in unnumbered lists
commits.body: We were matching only lines that included the item delimiter, now match secondary lines the same as the numbered list setting.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Don't disable indention corrections for HTML
commits.body: Previously we had a separate setting for HTML but one setting is more manageable.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Ensure the use of v1.8 of ruby
commits.body: A few places were missed in the previous commit, this is due to some incompatible changes in ruby 2.0. Fixes #11.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Add various non-english quotation marks to typing pairs

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.body:
Since the tool tip font is (no longer) fixed width, we need to use figure space as padding to make the digits align.

Additionally the thousand separator has been changed from a comma to a thin space, such that lines with different number of thousand groups can still be aligned properly.

commits.author: Stefan Daschek
commits.body: `wc -m` handles multibyte characters correctly (depending on the current locale).

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Remove shortcut for 'Extend Selection to Include Previous'
commits.body:
This fixes a conflict with the HTML command 'Wrap Selection in Open/Close Tag' among others. Command is still present should users want to add back this or another shortcut.

Fixes #6.
